backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that manages door entries with CRUD operations, calculates square footage, and computes totals grouped by coating type (single, double, doubleSagwan, laminate).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that the React Query hooks in useQueries.ts were reviewed and fixed for actor initialization timing and error handling issues.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and recent changes of each component, hook, and utility.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module with responsive viewport settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes the full application layout including customer info, door entry form, entry list, grand totals, quotation actions, theme toggle, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CustomerInfoForm: Controlled form component for entering customer name and mobile number, rendered inside a Card with icon-decorated inputs.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryForm.ts: Form component for adding a door entry by height and width (with fraction support); on submit it rounds dimensions and adds all four coating types via the addDoor mutation.
frontend/src/components/DoorEntryList.ts: Displays a table of all door entries with per-entry coating cost calculations, delete functionality, and a totals footer row. Handles loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/GrandTotals.tsx: Renders a summary card showing grand totals for all four coating types and total square footage, calculated from all door entries.
frontend/src/components/QuotationActions: Provides buttons to generate a printable HTML quotation or share it via WhatsApp, then clears all entries and customer info on success.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button component that toggles between light and dark themes using the useTheme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, adding, deleting, and bulk-deleting door entries via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state, persisting the preference to localStorage and applying the appropriate CSS class to the document root.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines a wood-inspired OKLCH color palette for both light and dark modes, plus a touch-target utility class.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with React Query's QueryClientProvider and a custom InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/utils/coatingRates.ts: Defines per-square-foot coating rates (single, double, doubleSagwan, laminate) and exports helpers to get a rate by CoatingType enum and calculate all coating amounts for a given square footage.
frontend/src/utils/dimensionRounding.ts: Provides rounding logic for door height and width to standard carpenter sizes, including priority-ordered combined rules (e.g., 40×80 and 38×78 special cases) via roundHeight, roundWidth, and roundDimensions functions.
frontend/src/utils/fractionParser.ts: Parses door dimension inputs in decimal or fractional (eighths) string format into decimal values, and converts decimals back to fraction display strings like '78 2/8'.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates an HTML quotation document string for a list of door entries, showing per-entry dimensions, square footage, and all four coating type amounts plus a summary section with totals.
Single-function utility that calculates square feet from rounded height and width using the formula (height × width) / 144.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Shares a door quotation file and pre-formatted text message via the Web Share API (with file support) or falls back to opening WhatsApp Web with a URL-encoded message.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends theme with custom fonts, border radii, accordion animations, and registers typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing a fix request to resolve backend errors where getDoorEntries and getTotals calls fail, causing 'Error loading' messages on page load.
